tn.algorithm

Class FrankWolfeRouterMSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • tn.algorithm.FrankWolfeRouterMSA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Router

    public class FrankWolfeRouterMSA
extends java.lang.Object
implements Router
    Implements the Router interface. Assumes infinite link capacities, and assumes that link cost is constant at its value when flow is zero. It then routes each user to the initially shortest path. Starting from the initial assignment, new costs are calculated and the corresponding new shortest paths are found.
    Author:
    Sherif Tolba

      • route

        public Assignment route(Demand demand)
        Specified by:
        route in interface Router
        Parameters:
        demand - Demand object containing a map of OD pairs and the corresponding demand volume
        Returns:
        Assignment object containing a map of paths and the corresponding flow in each path. Upon return, the actual flow in the network must remain unchanged
